{{Infobox Berry |name = #48 Kasib |image = [[File:Kasib.png]] |caption = Considered to have a special power from the olden days, this Berry is sometimes dried and used as a good-luck charm. Nearby Pok√©mon are wary of this Berry plant. |growtime = 5m 0s |harvest = 1 berry |replant = 100% |points = 25 |flavor =
*0 spicy *10 dry *20 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }} '''Kasib''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by letting any berry wither after unlocking [[Occa]] or any later berry. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stage Durations ! Seed !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- | 0-30s || 30-60s || 60-120s || 120-300s || 300-86400s |- | [[File:AllTreeSeed.png|50px]] || [[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] || [[File:KasibTreeTaller.png|50px]] || [[File:KasibTreeBloom.png|50px]] || [[File:KasibTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Kasib berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | [[Cheri]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Cheri]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Cheri]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Cheri]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Cheri]] |- | [[Cheri]] || [[Cheri]] || [[Cheri]] || [[Cheri]] || [[Cheri]] |- style="height: 26px;" | [[Cheri]] || [[Cheri]] || [[Cheri]] || [[Cheri]] || [[Cheri]] |- | [[Cheri]] || [[Cheri]] || [[Cheri]] || [[Cheri]] || [[Cheri]] |- | [[Cheri]] || [[Cheri]] || [[Cheri]] || [[Cheri]] || [[Cheri]] |}
